game_description: Get comfortable with interview nerves in a low-pressure environment. Practice and receive interview feedback as many times as you need to boost confidence and succeed. Correspond with HR, plan your travel to ensure you arrive on time, pick an outfit, catch the elevator, greet the receptionist, and ace the interview. Practice the whole process of job interviewing to accurately replicate the experience and prepare for the real thing. Get automated feedback across a range of metrics. If you're an individual looking to use this app for personal use, then please visit app.workwindow.com.au to create an account. If you're looking to use this application in a commercial, or education setting then please visit www.workwindow.com.au to request a demonstration. *This application is a Paid app
